title: Removing items from a List within a loop
It is tricky to remove items from a list while within a loop, this is due to the fact that the index and length of the list gets changed.

inline_content.Text: It is tricky to remove items from a list while within a loop, this is due to the fact that the index and length of the list gets changed.
